title: Haiyore! Nyaruko-san W OVA
original_name: 這いよれ！ニャル子さん W OVA
opening_song: "Koi wa Chaos no Shimobenari (恋は渾沌の隷也)" by Ushiro kara Haiyori-tai G (後ろから這いより隊 G
ending_song: "Yotte S.O.S (よって S.O.S)" by RAMM ni Haiyoru Nyaruko-san (RAMM に這いよるニャル子さん)
sinopse: Hot Spring-themed OVA of Haiyore! Nyaruko-san W.
